verses.verse: וַיָּ֣שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shev Then he brought me back אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti, דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar of the gate הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash sanctuary הַֽחִיצ֔וֹן <S%H2435><s%> ha-chi-Tzon, of the outward הַפֹּנֶ֖ה <S%H6437><s%> hap-po-Neh which looketh קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim; toward the east וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and it was סָגֽוּר׃ <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gur. and it [was] shut

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD הַשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar unto me This gate הַזֶּה֩ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh This סָג֨וּר <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gur shall be shut יִהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo and no יִפָּתֵ֗חַ <S%H6605><s%> yip-pa-Te-ach, it shall not be opened וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish and no man לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and no יָ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> Ya-vo shall enter ב֔וֹ vo, כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in by it because the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei- the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba hath entered ב֑וֹ <S%H99999><s%> vo; וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become סָגֽוּר׃ <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gur. in by it therefore it shall be shut

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנָּשִׂ֗יא <S%H5387><s%> han-na-Si, [It is] for the prince נָ֥שִׂיא <S%H5387><s%> Na-si the prince ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he יֵֽשֶׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> ye-shev- he shall sit בּ֥וֹ bo ; לֶאֱכֹול־ le-'e-chol- כלֶאֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> le-'e-chol- to eat לֶ֖חֶם <S%H398><s%> Le-chem in it to eat קלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD מִדֶּ֨רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> mid-De-rech by the way אֻלָ֤ם <S%H197><s%> 'u-Lam of the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of [that] gate יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo, he shall enter וּמִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> u-mid-dar-Ko by the way יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze. and shall go out

וַיְבִיאֵ֜נִי <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'E-ni Then brought דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- he me the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הַצָּפוֹן֮ <S%H6828><s%> hatz-tza-fOn of the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before הַבַּיִת֒ <S%H1004><s%> hab-ba-Yit the house וָאֵ֕רֶא <S%H7200><s%> va-'E-re and I looked וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> ma-Le filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> che-Vod- and behold the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> va-'ep-Pol and I fell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai. upon my face

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- unto me Son אָדָ֡ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> sim mark לִבְּךָ֩ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha well וּרְאֵ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh and behold בְעֵינֶ֜יךָ <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nei-cha with thine eyes וּבְאָזְנֶ֣יךָ <S%H241><s%> u-ve-'a-ze-Nei-cha with thine ears שְּׁמָ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma', and hear אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I מְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> me-dab-Ber all that I say אֹתָ֔ךְ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tach, לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all חֻקּ֥וֹת <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kot unto thee concerning all the ordinances בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- all; תֹּורֹתֹו to-ro-tov כתֹּֽורֹתָ֑יו <S%H8451><s%> to-ro-Tav; bullock קוְשַׂמְתָּ֤ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta thereof and mark לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha well לִמְב֣וֹא <S%H3996><s%> lim-Vo the entering in הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, of the house בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מוֹצָאֵ֥י <S%H4161><s%> mo-tza-'Ei with every going forth הַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash. of the sanctuary

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And thou shalt say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֶ֙רִי֙ <S%H4805><s%> me-ri to the rebellious אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit [even] to the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- let it suffice לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem מִֽכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol of all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-tei-Chem you of all your abominations בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בַּהֲבִיאֲכֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> ba-ha-vi-'a-Chem In that ye have brought בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- afflicted נֵכָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> ne-Char, alien עַרְלֵי־ <S%H6189><s%> 'ar-lei- uncircumcised לֵב֙ <S%H3820><s%> lev in heart וְעַרְלֵ֣י <S%H6189><s%> ve-'ar-Lei and uncircumcised בָשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> va-Sar, in flesh לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot to be in בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> be-mik-da-Shi to be in my sanctuary לְחַלְּל֣וֹ <S%H2490><s%> le-chal-le-Lo to pollute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּיתִ֑י <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti; it [even] my house בְּהַקְרִֽיבְכֶ֤ם <S%H7126><s%> be-hak-ri-ve-Chem when ye offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לַחְמִי֙ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mi my bread חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> Che-lev the fat וָדָ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> va-Dam, and the blood וַיָּפֵ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6565><s%> vai-ya-Fe-ru and they have broken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti, my covenant אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> 'el because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- to all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-tei-Chem. of all your abominations

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not שְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8104><s%> she-mar-Tem And ye have not kept מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret the charge קָדָשָׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shai; of mine holy things וַתְּשִׂימ֗וּן <S%H7760><s%> vat-te-si-Mun, but ye have set לְשֹׁמְרֵ֧י <S%H8104><s%> le-sho-me-Rei keepers מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֛י <S%H4931><s%> mish-mar-Ti of my charge בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> be-mik-da-Shi in my sanctuary לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the children נֵכָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> ne-Char, alien עֶ֤רֶל <S%H6189><s%> 'E-rel uncircumcised לֵב֙ <S%H3820><s%> lev in heart וְעֶ֣רֶל <S%H6189><s%> ve-'E-rel nor uncircumcised בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar, in flesh לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo shall enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִקְדָּשִׁ֑י <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-Shi; into my sanctuary לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol of all בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the sons נֵכָ֔ר <S%H5236><s%> ne-Char, alien אֲשֶׁ֕ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch of any stranger that [is] among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, And the Levites אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who רָֽחֲקוּ֙ <S%H7368><s%> ra-cha-Ku that are gone away far מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai, and בִּתְע֤וֹת <S%H8582><s%> bit-'ot went astray יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El from me when Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who תָּע֣וּ <S%H8582><s%> ta-'U which went astray away מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai, and אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei from me after גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Hem; their idols וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> ve-na-se-'U they shall even bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nam. their iniquity

וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become בְמִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <S%H4720><s%> ve-mik-da-Shi in my sanctuary מְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <S%H8334><s%> me-Sha-re-Tim, Yet they shall be ministers פְּקֻדּוֹת֙ <S%H6486><s%> pe-kud-dOt [having] charge אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> sha-'a-Rei at the gates הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, of the house וּֽמְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <S%H8334><s%> u-me-sha-re-Tim and ministering אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; to the house הֵ֠מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they יִשְׁחֲט֨וּ <S%H7819><s%> yish-cha-Tu they shall slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֹלָ֤ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַזֶּ֙בַח֙ <S%H2077><s%> haz-Ze-vach and the sacrifice לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am, for the people וְהֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah and they יַעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du and they shall stand לִפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem before לְשָֽׁרְתָֽם׃ <S%H8334><s%> le-Sha-re-Tam. them to minister

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an, because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher they יְשָׁרְת֤וּ <S%H8334><s%> ye-sha-re-Tu Because they ministered אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei unto them before גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Hem, their idols וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu and became לְבֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- and caused the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <S%H4383><s%> le-mich-Shol to fall עָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von; into iniquity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against כֵּן֩ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that נָשָׂ֨אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti therefore have I lifted up יָדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, against נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um against them saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> ve-na-se-'U and they shall bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nam. their iniquity

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor יִגְּשׁ֤וּ <S%H5066><s%> yig-ge-Shu And they shall not come near אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לְכַהֵ֣ן <S%H3547><s%> le-cha-Hen unto me to do the office of a priest לִ֔י Li, וְלָגֶ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5066><s%> ve-la-Ge-shet unto me nor to come near עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any קָ֣דָשַׁ֔י <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shai, to any of my holy things אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about קָדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Shei in the most holy הַקְּדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> hak-ke-da-Shim; to the things וְנָֽשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> ve-na-se-'U [place] but they shall bear כְּלִמָּתָ֔ם <S%H3639><s%> ke-lim-ma-Tam, their shame וְתוֹעֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H8441><s%> ve-to-'a-vo-Tam and their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su. which they have committed

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti But I will make אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rei them keepers מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret of the charge הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; of the house לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol of all עֲבֹ֣דָת֔וֹ <S%H5656><s%> a-Vo-da-To, for all the service וּלְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> u-le-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh thereof and for all that shall be done בּֽוֹ׃ bo. פ Peh
